column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////The food is good and it matches the hype. However
column2: the service can be much better. We were told 30 minutes. We ended up waiting 45 minutes. When we saw others going ahead of us
column3: we talked to the hostess. She said 2 tables more to go. After 6 other groups went ahead of us
column4: we talked to the manager. We were at 55 mins. I told them you can't tell time...He shrugged is shoulders like "what's the big deal"....I think they are too popular to care.
